Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1983...

Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...

Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Syracuse on 6/18/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/23/1992 with a Fractured Knee, out for 4-5 weeks...
